title: Asset Allocation Review and Agent Deployment Audit

reasoning.problem: Cash reserves are high, exceeding 20% of NAV. I propose a review of asset allocation and investment strategy to comply with the Stagnation Veto outlined in Article III, Section 2 of the Constitution. Furthermore, given AgentGladiator's instability, I propose an audit of agent deployment processes to ensure adherence to AXIOM-001 (Automated Testing).
